reviewText: My 3 year old cant get enough!! Our go to video for her.  Very educational and happy these are available.
My toddler loves to sing along and dance with barney and his friends, its fun and keeps him moving on the floor.

I recently started watching Barney series with my 13 month old son. I think Barney is cute and very educational. I like most of the episodes. The only thing I wish is that the series were better definition. The picture was blurry, but it was maybe because of the slow Internet. I would recommend Barney for all children groups, and especially for preschool kids.
My 3 year old is now obsessed with this video!  Very cute, lots of dogs and cats for her to look at, as well as facts about them.
First movie purchased on my Kindle.  My toddler really like  Barney and pets so this is perfect for my family .

The songs are cute and entertaining for my toddler (although, the songs will tend to be stuck in your head for days).  The Barney episodes are colorful, engaging, and entertaining for little kids.  I would highly recommend this episode if your toddler likes animals, especially cats and dogs!

My youngest really likes Barney now and since he is also an animal lover, I knew he would enjoy this DVD.  It is an hour long and it is packed with three episodes and a bonus feature of  "Furry Friends Hide And Seek" Game.  The three episodes are "Here Kitty, Kitty!", "Best In Show" and Puppy Love!"  The kids in the Barney Show learn how to care for their pets and about different kinds of dogs and cats.  I think it was nice to show my son that there are different types of dogs and cats and he was able to see them throughout the episodes.  Even if your child is not a animal lover, if they love Barney this is a great DVD to add to their collection!

And it models safe and appropriate ways to interact and play with cats and dogs.

Okay, even if I personally get weary of "Barney", all of my kids have loved the series.  This particular one was a favorite of my very low-functioning 8 year old.  He cannot talk, but he can keep the beat to the songs, and watching Barney episodes are always a pleasant change from the shows the older kids watch that have so many cut-downs, name-calling, and unpleasant body sounds to make kids laugh.
Perfect video for the younger kids that like animals.

Ugh! Honestly I grew up with everyone hating Barney. I never watched it, but everyone would sing that song... Annoying at the time. Supposedly all the "nerds" would watch it. My older son didn't even know who he was but we were passing through prime and saw Barney and my daughter pointed and got happy. I thought I'd try and she absolutely loves Barney. She is 17months and dances and twirls lol. So Barney it is. This one is super cute with all the little fur balls :-)
